title: Daughter of Darkness
tags: journey to the house of grief
find a way into the cloister
content:
confront him and respond from the following choices:

I was hoping for something more substantial than 'thanks.' How did you get here? What is this place? I cleared the way to this place, not you. W Why shouldn't I just kill you instead of letting you interfere? Lead on, then. Attack.

If you choose option 1, he will eventually end the conversation and you can proceed through the Nightsong's Prison. Continue to descend. You should be able to use Jump to get to the lower platforms. Continue down
